sabawinma dirgha kalina nihadiyawak nima wanne maha khedanthayakini. ῝sha῞ kandu garbhaya ginigena dawena mohotheda mirshawan mula paddhathiya haraha ekwemin sitiyaha. ῞so῝ kandu sirasehi un mirshawata awasan jiwa daharawa thilina kala sesu pemwath wrukshaya dawi halu wi mohothakin aguru bawata pathwa raktha warnayen thewarak dilisi niwi , yalith warak thambaili warnayen dilisi niwi anathuruwa thada kalu agurak bawata path wuyeya.mohothakata dakunu iwura mulumaninma nishchalathawayata path wiya.
siyallo eka pelata sitagath mohothaka apa kawiya, uthure piditha minisunge samaja aragalaya pilibanda thama sthawaraya pahadiliwa liyayi.

ihatha rupaye paridi apata ek waguwakin wishayan pilibandawath ( waguwa: wishaya | lakshana: nama, kala_parichcheda_ganana ) thawath waguwakin guruwarayin pilibandawath ( waguwa: guruwaraya | nama, uganwana_wishaya, lipinaya ) nirupanaya kala haka.
iwasimath, sanyamayath, pilisandarath nathi thana wishwaye nirmalathama dahama adahuwada in apata salasena setha kumak da ?

gampaha disthrikkaye pihiti rohal nawikaranaya kirima yatathe waththala handala laduru rohala prathisanskaranaya kirimata niyamitha athara ehi wathman thaththwaya soya balima sandaha aarthika sanwardhana amathi basil rajapaksha mahatha nirikshana charikawaka niratha wiya.laduru rogaya sandaha prathikara soya ganimen pasu 1983 sita mema rohalata rogin athulath karaganima nawatha thibena heyin pauranika watinakamak athi oolanda yugaye 1708 di godananga athi mema rohala sancharaka aakarshaniya sthanayak lesa sanrakshanaya kirime wadagathkama mehidi awadharanaya kerini.mema rohala laduru rogaya sandaha nisi prathikara soya ganimata pera ema rogaya waladi athi rogin sandaha idikarana laddak wana athara rohala aarambha kala wakawanuwe rogin 1,900 k pamana newasikawa prathikara labaathi bawada me wanawita suwaya labu rogin 43 k ema rohalehi newasikawa sitina bawada aarthika sanwardhana amathyanshaya pawasayi.eyin 15 deneku sthi්ran wana athara owun sampurna suwaya laba thibuna da niweswalin bhara noganima hethuwen rohalema natharawi sitina bawa rohale karya bhara waidya niladhari namal gunasekara mahatha sandahan karayi.me wanawita shri lankawe warshikawa laduru rogin 2,000 k pamana hadunagena athi athara wadima rogin sankhyawak wartha wanne basnahira palatheni.

ee 1565 wasarayi.parangi suwada thawaragena hamana goda sulan ralla sundara appuge nahaya winiwida yanne ohuta mahath apulak genademini.ohuta me kisiwak sithagatha nohaka.athithaye thama muthun miththange anin pamanakadu nowa thamange anasaka yatatheth wirajamanawu lankadwipaya parangin ralak wisin yatath kara ganu labuwe keseda ?…yam tharamakata ho aswasillak aththe thawamath owunta yatath kara gannata hakiwi aththe me muhudubada danawwa pamanak wimayi.rajasinha rajuge wishishta ranakamithwaya nisa thawamath paranginta me uthum diwayina unge anasakata gannata bari wi atha.thama paramparawe wira dhira urumaya thawamath merata raja paramparawa thula methuwak ho radi thibima koyitharam nam deyakda ?.rate thathwaya gana etharamin ho hitha hadagaththath sundara appuge hithata wada dena anek lokuma gataluwa thama birida ha sohoyuraya.pera kala kashyapa namin rajakam kala thaman me aathmayedi sundara appu namin pahatha ratiyekwa ipadimath, ohuge sithagima priyambikawak wu wijjulatha thama ambauwama wi aariyawathi namin upatha labimath sabawinma pudumayaki.
